scenario: I'm finding a calm, low-energy senior dog as a companion. He prefers boxers or bulldogs and we want a dog that is already altered or otherwise a good fit for a quiet household. To decide, I'll look specifically for a male senior boxer near 90028, survey the available senior spayed/neutered dogs in that neighborhood, and also check whether any English bulldogs being privately rehomed nearby might be a match.
combined_task: Find and compare available senior, spayed/neutered companion dogs near zip code 90028—prioritizing male senior boxers and English bulldogs cared for by private owners—for adoption or private rehoming.
selected_subtasks: Find a male senior boxer near zip code 90028.
Find an English bulldog near zip code 90028 that was cared for by a private owner.
Browse senior spayed/neutered dogs near zip code 90028.
